thread.title: Chennai suburban train guard falls unconscious after being hit by stone
thread.title_full: Chennai suburban train guard falls unconscious after being hit by stone

author: V Ayyappan
title: Chennai suburban train guard falls unconscious after being hit by stone
text:
CHENNAI: Suburban trains on the Beach-Tambaram section were delayed for nearly 25 minutes on Wednesday after a guard of a train fell unconscious when a stone thrown by some miscreants hit his head. 

A railway official said the incident came to light when the Beach-Tambaram train reached Pallavaram railway station around 4.45pm. The motorman had not received any signal from the guard after the train reached the station. 

The guard was found lying unconscious in his cabin at the rear end of the train. He was moved to a private hospital. 

The train was stranded at the station for 25 minutes, and it resumed journey around 5.15pm. 

As the line got blocked, a few other trains were also delayed.
